name: places/ChIJq6p-_SFawokRVlm_pQat1Ho
adrFormatAddress: 11, 277 Broadway, New York, NY 10007, USA

originalText.text:
When it comes to speaking to your lawyers, they are not reliable, the receptionist claim they give the messages to the lawyers, but who knows. I have left a total of 10 messages to call me back in 10 different occasions and never received a call back. This firm is 20/80, they do 20% of the work and client does 80%.

Examples....  if there is a form that needs to be sent ASAP, it takes them a week and a half, verses myself who’s taken the lead, and takes one to two days. A simple call back which takes one day, depending the amount of work one has, me it takes less then 30 mins.

Instead of the lawyers having copies of forms they should already have, they take the ones the client brings in and doesn’t return.

Robert Bellone does not return phone calls nor emails and almost always his phone is sent to voicemail, the only way to speak to him is if you go to his office on Friday’s and you drive far. Nice fella when spoken in person.

Manny in the Manhatton office, is a good lawyer except lately he doesn’t seem to remember his clients and also doesn’t return messages, he does his home work and is always on point when in court. Disappointed he doesn’t even reach out like before.

What is frustrating about this firm is that the NYC receptionist need to be  replaced by more caring and kinder ones, when you call you get the vibe that they really don’t want to be bother or help you. Along with the lawyers informing us that we can call and they will call us back, when it’s a Illusion and a hoax’s.

Why hire a firm that doesn’t Cominicate correctly to there clients.  Unfortunately they started well with me back in 2013, but since then they have fallen and forgotten about many of there loyal clients, including me.

One has to take time from ones Schedule to drive pay $40 parking or get on the train and wait 2 hours to speak to them, when all they have to do is return a simple call....  this is for the Manhattan office.

originalText.text: Call the Bar Association for a Better Lawer. You'll be better off. Isn't That Right ! MR: Robert ballone! This is Fraud at it's BEST! THEY WILL SELL YOU OUT!
